summaryOfNewsArticle: An article published on October 4, 2023, in a leading cultural journal discusses how the rise of social media has significantly influenced societal norms and traditional cultural practices. The piece explores how digital platforms have become central to modern communication, often replacing face-to-face interactions. While such shifts have led to new forms of cultural expression and connectivity, they have also raised concerns about the erosion of deep-rooted traditions. The article calls for a more balanced integration of technology into daily life to preserve cultural integrity while embracing innovation.
title: How Social Media Is Reshaping Cultural Practices
